column4: I just upgraded an Xubuntu 10.10 box to Ubuntu 11.10, and now the box won't boot. The keyboard LEDs blink at turn on, but that's it. ‎I can't even get into CMOS!?
I think it's worse than that, ‎I can't boot from the CD either, something strange has happened.
reseated the mother board power connector, and now ‫I'm booting again, whew!
